breakingChangesNotes: **Important Note**: The following playbooks: **Cortex XDR - Cloud Cryptojacking**, **Cortex XDR - Cloud Cryptojacking - Set Verdict** and **XCortex XDR - Cloud Enrichment**, and the **Cortex XDR - Cloud Cryptojacking layout** have been moved to the 'Cloud Incident Response' pack. The 'Cloud Incident Response' pack will be installed as a dependency of the 'Cortex XDR' pack.
